title: NFL Around the League: August 9, 2013
itunes:title: NFL Around the League: August 9, 2013
description:
Marc Sessler, Gregg Rosenthal and Chris Wesseling break down the NFL preseason Week 1 action and discuss the nuances around the league, including San Francisco 49ers QB Colin Kaepernick’s beard. Also, find out which intro music received the most votes via Twitter this week. Tweet the podcast at @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
